assistant_last_response_text:
I need some context first - I don't see any video or interface you're referring to. Could you either:

1. Provide a URL to navigate to, or
2. Tell me which application/website we should be looking at

Without this context, I cannot locate the video player interface or comment section you're referring to. Once you provide this information, I can help execute those steps precisely.
